contest-event.event-date:
Nov. 5, 2017 D Yorkshire & Humberside BBA Contest (Section B)
Yorkshire & Humberside BBA Contest (Section B) 210 Test Piece Contest Yorkshire & Humberside BBA Contest yhbba-contest
None
Hymn & Own Choice Test Piece Contest
Town Hall, Dewsbury, West Yorkshire Section placings determined by points awarded for Test Piece. Overall Winner determined by combined points awarded for Test Piece plus Hymn.
Overall Winner: Charles Smith Trophy and Services of a Geneva Artiste _____North Skelton_________________ Winning Conductor: YHBBA Glass Trophy _Lewis Wilkinson, North Skelton____ Best Instrumentalist: YHBBA Glass Trophy_Flugel, North Skelton____________ Best Hymn: Jack Stirk Memorial Bowl___Eccleston________________________ Best Third Section Band: Bob Cherry Memorial Cup + £200 ___North Skelton______________________ Runner up Third Section Band John Smith Brewery Cup + £100 ___Eccleston__________________________ Best Fourth Section Band: John Swaine Memorial Rose Bowl + £200 ___Jayess Newbiggin_______________ Newmoon Insurance award to band playing No.1 (£25) __Dronfield Genquip____
Sept. 25, 2017, 8:28 p.m. Nov. 6, 2017, 1:55 p.m.
1 North Skelton Band Lewis Wilkinson The Saga of Tyrfing
2 Eccleston Brass John Wood Renaissance
3 Dronfield (CMW) Band Damian Wileman Henry the Fifth [Vaughan Williams]
4 Jayess Newbiggin Brass Band Andrew Griffiths Music from Kantara
5 Friendly Band (Sowerby Bridge) Neil Robinson
5 Swinton and District Excelsior Band [N Yorks] Unknown
7 Lofthouse 2000 Brass Band Unknown
Withdrawn Deepcar Brass Band Unknown
